channel.title: Makiing my vid less in filesize
channel.description:
I want to upload a vid i reced on WoW, and ive edited it added musikc and so on. but the file size is 800MB! and its a short vid.
how can i make it fill less to upload in youtube? ive seen longer vids with music, and more on youtube, so somehow they are way smaller.
how? i really need some help. another vid i made was 7gig!

item.title: Makiing my vid less in filesize
item.dc:creator: @LegendaryLoser .Flair
item.description:
@LegendaryLoser wrote:

For no reason should one movie file be 800 MB. Spiderman 3 was only 700 (high quality as well)…

Well, use Camtasia or HyperCam, import into Windows Movie Maker (or what ever basic program you have in your OS), and use that. The largest file I’ve ever had to make with it is 150MB and it was at least half n hour long

Read full topic
item.source: Makiing my vid less in filesize
